remarks: Scalar product with ring unit.  ( ~ ax-hvmulid analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodvs1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvs1.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvs1.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvs1.u $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` F ) $.
lmodvs1 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( .1. .x. X ) = X ) $.
